server.name: io.github.shinpr/sub-agents-mcp
server.description: MCP server for delegating tasks to specialized AI assistants in Cursor and other tools

environmentVariables.description: Absolute path to the directory containing agent definition files (.md or .txt)
environmentVariables.name: AGENTS_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Type of AI CLI to use: 'cursor' or 'claude'
environmentVariables.name: AGENT_TYPE

environmentVariables.description: Maximum execution time for agents in milliseconds (default: 300000, max: 600000)
environmentVariables.name: EXECUTION_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariables.description: Enable session management to maintain execution history across agent calls (default: false)
environmentVariables.name: SESSION_ENABLED

environmentVariables.description: Directory path for storing session files (default: .mcp-sessions in current working directory)
environmentVariables.name: SESSION_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Number of days to retain session history before automatic cleanup (default: 7)
environmentVariables.name: SESSION_RETENTION_DAYS
